page.title: 14Interview with a housewife.
page.content: I interviewed my mum.I asked her"Do you do your shopping in Sandwich?".She answered"I do a little bit of shopping during the week in Sandwich but I do the main shopping in Deal,in Keymarkets which is a supermarket". She shops daily for bits and pieces but she does the main shopping weekly.She shere she does because you can buy larger variety and it is sometimes cheaper.Sandwich as a shopping centre she thinks is poor. When I asked"Does Sandwich provide enough interest for young people in the evening?"she said"No".In her spare time she reads,knits,does gardening and relaxes.When I asked"Can you tell me a bit more about the things you enjoy?" she replied"I enjoy gardening and I like to see the garden looking nice and I like to pick my own vegetables.I also enjoy knitting for the family".
